name: inventory-dp

tableSchemas.name: inventory
tableSchemas.title: Inventory
tableSchemas.description: Ecological Inventories of dwc:Organisms that occur at some place during some time.

tableSchemas.name: related-event
tableSchemas.title: RelatedEvent
tableSchemas.description: Other actions that occur at some location during some time.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence
tableSchemas.title: Occurrence
tableSchemas.description: Occurrences of dwc:Organisms in place and time.

tableSchemas.name: related-material
tableSchemas.title: RelatedMaterial
tableSchemas.description: MaterialEntities associated with an Event (Inventory, MaterialGathering, Occurrence, InteractionOccurrence) or other MaterialEntities.

tableSchemas.name: collection
tableSchemas.title: Collection
tableSchemas.description: Persistent formal repositories in which dwc:MaterialEntities and/or Media are preserved.

tableSchemas.name: genetic-sequence
tableSchemas.title: GeneticSequence
tableSchemas.description: Digital representations of a nucleotide sequences.

tableSchemas.name: inventory-target
tableSchemas.title: InventoryTarget
tableSchemas.description: Specifications of characteristics of dwc:Organisms in an Inventory that were included or excluded.

tableSchemas.name: inventory-target-abundance
tableSchemas.title: InventoryTargetAbundance
tableSchemas.description: Reported quantities of observed dwc:Organisms of a given dwc:Taxon in a set of InventoryTargets.

tableSchemas.name: related-identification
tableSchemas.title: RelatedIdentification
tableSchemas.description: Taxonomic determinations (e.g., assignments to dwc:Taxon).

tableSchemas.name: identification-taxon
tableSchemas.title: IdentificationTaxon
tableSchemas.description: The components and order of dwc:Taxa in an Identification.

tableSchemas.name: inventory-media
tableSchemas.title: InventoryMedia
tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to Inventory Events.

tableSchemas.name: related-event-media
tableSchemas.title: RelatedEventMedia
tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to RelatedEvents.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-media

tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to Occurrences of dwc:Organisms.

tableSchemas.title: RelatedMaterialMedia

tableSchemas.name: related-identification-media

tableSchemas.description: Media (sound, image, video, text) related directly to RelatedIdentifications.

title: Darwin Core Inventory Data Package
description: A data package for sharing ecological inventory data.
